algorithms.bcc
Class BCCAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
  algorithms.bcc.BCCAlgorithm

public class BCCAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

Extracts bi-connected components during a DFS run and adds them to the growing bi-connected components' tree. Thus, the tree is also constructed eagerly (and not after the DFS has finished).

Constructor Summary

          NOTE: was not tested with directed graphs !
